Content:: Raseen Mohammed Imam is a Sri Lankan politician and former Member of Parliament. Imam was a National List MP for the Tamil National Alliance (TNA) in the Sri Lankan Parliament between February 2008 and February 2010,[1][2] having taken over from M.K. Eelaventhan MP, who was expelled from Parliament in December 2007. Imam was not selected as a TNA candidate for the 2010 parliamentary election.
Title: Raseen Mohammed Imam - Wikipedia
